messages.subject: Re: disrespectful parenting, rant, I think?
messages.msgSnippet: ... deGonzalez  wrote: You have been a wonderful friend to the mom and ... one! ... Thanks, Melanie (and everyone else, too).  You re
messages.messageBody:
--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, Melanie Freisinger
deGonzalez <gonzalezpalace5@a...> wrote:
You have been a wonderful friend to the mom and
> > especially the daughter!
> > Hold on and keep talking here, so you know you are not the crazy
one!
> > Blessings,
> > melanie

Thanks, Melanie (and everyone else, too). You're very affirming. I
do value this list enormously. Have been lurking here on and off for
awhile. Am glad to be back.

Laura B.

messages.subject: RE: disrespectful parenting, rant, I think?
messages.msgSnippet: The friends I ve gained by maintaining my integrity are better than ... “Truth is like the sun. You can shut it out for a time, but it ain’t going away.”
messages.messageBody:
The friends I've gained by maintaining my integrity are better than
> those who
>> would have demanded I compromise it to keep them in my life.
>>
>> Sandra
>
> Laura,
> I think the above is so true and will comfort you if you let it. It
> is so hard and so sad when 'friends' turn on you when you are doing
> what you believe is right and letting your children do what they want
> and need to do. You have been a wonderful friend to the mom and
> especially the daughter!
> Hold on and keep talking here, so you know you are not the crazy one!
> Blessings,
> melanie







�Truth is like the sun. You can shut it out for a time, but it ain�t going away.� -Elvis Presley
